name: JABBERWOCKY (Jade)
description:
Game Jam game for GDU's second Winter Game Jam!

Theme: Fairy Tale

Jabberwocky is inspired by Alice in Wonderland. It takes place in a chaotic and cramped desert village covered in snow. The village is dead silent for something lurks within the cities walls.

This was a lot of fun to make! I might work on it some more, then again I saw that with every game jam project lol.
